summary: I HAVE BROUGHT THIS COMPLAINT UP NUMEROUS TIMES I HAVE A CLICKING NOISE COMING FROM THE WHEEL ON THE  FRONT DRIVERS SIDE I WAS TOLD IT IS A NORMAL SOUND I MAY NOT WORK ON CARS BUT I'M SURE YOU SHOULD NOT HAVE A NOISE COMING FROM YOUR HUB OR WHEEL . I STILL HAVE THE SOUND COMING FROM THE AREA AND NO ONE CAN HELP ME I HAVE PAID THE CAR IN FULL AND WOULD LIKE TO SELL IT BUT BECAUSE OF NISSAN NOT FIXING THE PROBLEM I MIGHT HAVE A PROBLEM SELLING A CAR WITH A SOUND COMING FROM THE WHEEL THE SOUND IS ALL THE TIME I'M SO DISAPPOINTING WITH NISSAN THAT I WILL BE SURE NOT TO BUY ANOTHER VEHICLE FROM THEM ALSO ON TOP OF  NOT FIXING THIS PROBLEM ER ARE A MILITARY FAMILY AND THIS IS HOW NISSAN TREATS MILITARY PERSONAL. AFTER PAYING $56,000 FOR A CAR YOU THINK I WOULD HAVE BEEN FIXED    .
